alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 26 at 2:08PM PST until December 28 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 18 to 24 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...From 4 AM Tuesday to 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. The ample snowfall will cause heightened risk for avalanches. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
